data.message:
I have some new ideas to get you, or rap lyrics, but as I'm doing singing lessons to improve my compositions, I'm not sending them for now, but I will send you some this year yet

Yes I am taking care of my voice, doing singing lesson, because it is the right thing to do within the music, regardless of whether you sing rap or other musical genre, care for the voice is necessary

We will work this year still a new song, Marshall, however I know you are very busy with other projects, so at the right time you will present the songs, have a nice day

replies.message: قصمك و هو عارف بيعمل ايه translat : have anice day
